decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun no later than 26th January 2019.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Drawing no's: SCC/GP/101-T1; SJB15-009-02 (Football Pitch Lighting); SCC/GP/AGP/20B T1, 21C, 23D, 24C, 26E, 27C T1 & 28D; GNS/SP/PHI/001 T01 & 002; GNS/SP/701 T02, 702 T02, 703 T02, 704 T02 & 801 T01; 61767-110 B (car park phasing plan); (06)010 T1; (08)001, 002 A, 003 A, 007 A, 008 A, 009 A, 010 A, 011 A, 012 A, 013 A & 020; Planning Statement; Energy Strategy Report; Updated Phase 1 Habitat Survey and Bat Survey Report; Arboriculural Assessment Report; Planning Noise Assessment Report; Community Development Programme Overview Report; Tennis Courts Flodlighting Report (SJB Floodlighting Ltd; dated 29-04-2016); BREEAM Preliminary Assessment Report; Tree Protection Plan; all received 7th August 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) to allow amendments to the appearance of the development, and deletion of conditions 3-23  in respect of listed building consent 00885/A/L15 dated 26/01/2016 for: Listed building consent for a joint application for the redevelopment of the redundant bowls green, playing fields and garden nursery depot and existing car park sites within the wider Gunnersbury Park involving removal of various greenhouses, glasshouses and lean-to-structures within the garden nursery depot site together with the existing changing and cricket pavilions adjacent to the model farm complex, retention of the listed 'kitchen garden' walls originally associated with the small and large mansions, erection of a new two storey buiding on the site of the redundant bowls green comprising team changing rooms for the external sports facilities, 5 court sports hall, multi-use studios and associated changing facilities, cafe community room, archive store and office accommodation together with associated external works comprising new natural grass pitches for rugby, cricket, floodlit artificial grass pitches and floodlit tennis courts, multi-use games area, external gym equipment, associated external sports store, car parking provision, cycle storage, waste and recycling facilities and associated hard and soft landscaping.
